plot: The film builds up a portrait of a great Sudanese film-maker, Gadalla Gubara. At eighty-seven, he is one of the pioneers of cinema in Africa. He has recently lost his sight but still ...
title: Cinema in Sudan: Conversations with Gadalla Gubara
